featured.text: The greening of airports is just one of these attempts.

definition.zh_def: 使變綠，特別是通過植樹或其他環保措施來改善環境。
definition.en_def: The process of making something greener, especially through planting trees or implementing environmentally friendly practices.
definition.example: The city is focusing on greening its urban areas by adding more parks and green spaces.
